name: df-mp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmp, cmpo(s0, s1, cnp, cnp, cab(s2, wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmq, cv(s4))))))))
comment: Define multiplication on positive reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
